About me

Hi! I am Bratislav (Slava) Melandovich, expert & consultant with 10 years of vast experience in IT business, CEO FOUNDER of ANVI (IT outsourcing and outstaffing), and JOBITT (ANONYMOUS IT JOB SEARCH). ANVI is a leading Software Company with offices in Israel and Ukraine, providing development, marketing, analytics, and IT outsourcing outstaffing services across the globe.
